importantArticles.headline: - Equities extended their losing streak as VOO, SPY hit bear market territory intraday. - Bond ETFs also dropped as Trump threatens more China tariffs. - Recession and interest rate hike fears pushed investors into buffer ETFs: Innovator.

importantArticles.headline: JPMorgan projects Trump's hefty tariff plan will push the US economy into recession in the second half of 2025.

importantArticles.headline: - Oil prices cratered on Friday, tumbling to their lowest levels since 2021. - WTI crude oil traded as low as $60.45 per barrel. - Energy remains one of the better-performing sectors this year.
